node.html:
• Developed full stack MERN applications from ideation to development, and deployment phase.
  • Implemented reusable components in React.js and Tailwind and used Redux for state management.
  • Built backend REST APIs with Express.js with authentication and CRUD operations on MongoDB.
  • Deployed serverless functions on Google Cloud Platform.

• Developed cross-platform applications in Flutter from UI development to backend API integration.
  • Integrated Firebase, Cloud Fire Store and SQLite databases for seamless performance.
  • Built apps with Bluetooth, and Wi-Fi connectivity with IoT devices and microcontrollers.
  • Worked with native mobile features like Notifications, GPS Location, Camera, Microphone, File Storage.
